descriptionHtml:
[b][center][img]http://oi58.tinypic.com/2e4d6xh.jpg[/img]
[size=5]Swords On Back - For Cloaks[/size][/center]

[u]DESCRIPTION:[/u][/b]
I tried to find a mod like this that doesn't clip with the cloaks but i failed so i made one myself. This is a skeleton mod that replaces one and two handed swords position. Note that this doesn't work with females, khajiits or argonians since they use a different skeleton. So if you want to look like The Witcher Geralt or Talion from Shadow of Mordor or if you simply want to look like a BAMF, this is a perfect mod for you!

[u]REQUIREMENTS:[/u]
Realistic Ragdolls and Force by [b]dDefinder: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/?[/b]
Equipping Overhaul by [b]DragonDude1029: [/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49784/?

[u]INSTALLATION:[/u]
Extract the file and copy the folder "Data" to your Skyrim directory or simply install with Nexus Mod Manager(RECOMMENDED).

NOTE: If installing manually, make sure you backup your files first!

[u]UNINSTALLATION:[/u]
Delete the files that you extracted from your Skyrim installation directory or deactivate and remove the mod with Nexus Mod Manager.

[b][u]SWORDS USED ON THE FIRST PICTURE:[/u][/b]
LUNA by [b]Zikoru: [/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55644/?
Witchers Silver Sword by [b]Kimono: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16991/?[/b]

[u][b]HIGHLY RECOMMENDED MODS:
[/b][/u]Cloaks of Skyrim by [b]Noodles[/b]: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?
HDT Equipment by [b]IceKK and Jacques00art[/b]: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57408/?
Greatsword sheaths and scabbards by [b]DoubleBrewski[/b]: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5624/?

[u]PERMISSIONS:[/u]
You may not modify or re-upload this mod anywhere without my permission.




[center][img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/ubyhj.jpg[/img][/center]
author: Rakul
